about_the_game:
In May 2032, the Government of the Republic of Korea declared a lockdown on the City of Seoul.

Seoul was devastated and sealed off in the aftermath of war and biochemical attacks. Many survivors still live in this abandoned former capital city, unable to escape, exhausting their lives for the rest of their lives.

Among these miserable Seoulites are ‘Leech’, the lonely survivor, who strives day-to-day by scavenging abandoned city facilities and ripping off other bandits, and ‘Master’, the cocktail geek who modified an abandoned subway train to run a cocktail bar.

Witness the butterfly effect of the influence of two people throughout Seoul, starting from the unexpected moment when the two characters' paths intersect.

Combine discarded groceries and alcohol to make cocktails and serve them to guests.

Combine ingredients' six flavor elements and personalities to create a cocktail with harmonious and appealing tastes. Guess customers’ taste in drinks and win their trust to uncover the hidden stories of this city and its people.

Explore Seoul's abandoned subway facilities and witness new stories.

Explore abandoned subway facilities, find new materials, and encounter special characters. Get rid of obstacles on subway rail and move on, defeating road robbers and hostile forces. All the stages, including tunnels and history, are designed based on real Seoul subway lines.

Find out the answer that a human must present against the great absurdness built by war and lockdown.

Survivors of Seoul, in an instant, went from the capital residents of the world's 10th most developed country to tramping daily life under threat of death. But what motive or desire still drives them to live on? Will ‘Leech' be able to find the answer to this question after following each customer's story?

content_descriptors.notes: BA contains mature content or themes including alcohol, tobacco, violence and murder with expressions of blood targeting non-realistic humanoid characters,
